title: Account Executive (UK)
description:
Who is Fergus:

We’re building the world’s most loved SaaS platform for Tradies. Our intuitive cloud-based job management software is helping tradespeople across the globe manage their business in a smarter, more efficient way. From site visits through to scheduling, quoting, invoicing, and much more - Fergus arranges all tasks in one place and gives our customers the insight they need to grow their business.

Founded in 2014 as the brainchild of Dan Pollard, a veteran NZ Tradie, who spent many years deep in the trenches. Eventually burning out and going bust, Dan realised that a trades business needs proper systems in place to keep it running … without running its owner into the ground.

Fast-forward to today, we’re a Series B ($15m) global B2B SaaS business with offices in New Zealand (HQ), Australia and now a rapidly scaling team in Manchester, UK.

The opportunity:

Our UK Sales Team is growing! We’re now looking for an Account Executive (SMB) to help grow new sales and work closely with our CS and Marketing team to manage the full end-to-end sales process. 

You must be open to occasional travel to conferences, events, trade shows and customer meets across the UK (fully expensed, of course!)

What you’ll be doing:

  • As an SaaS Account Executive, you’ll be focused on driving new business sales and contributing to the overall Fergus business growth in the UK.
  • You’ll be working directly with customers via telephone, video and online interactions to sell our cloud-based SaaS platform
  • You’ll be managing new inbound leads from qualification to trial to adoption. 
  • You’ll work closely with our CS, Marketing and global Product team to ensure the customer journey is optimised for adoption
  • You’ll be utilising our cutting-edge Sales Tech, ensuring data accuracy and integrity is at the forefront of everything you do.

title: Country Manager ANZ
description:
Who is Fergus:

Our intuitive cloud-based job management software is helping tradespeople across the globe manage their business in a smarter, more efficient way. From site visits through to scheduling, quoting, invoicing, and much more - Fergus arranges all tasks in one place and gives our customers the insight they need to grow their business.

Founded in 2014 as the brainchild of Dan Pollard, a veteran NZ Plumber, who spent many years deep in the trenches. Eventually burning out and going bust, Dan realised that a trades business needs proper systems in place to keep it running … without running its owner into the ground.

Fast-forward to today, we’re a Series B ($15m) global B2B SaaS business with rapidly scaling offices in New Zealand (HQ), Australia and the UK.

The opportunity:

Leading all aspects of our GTM (sales, marketing, partnerships and customer) you will position Fergus as the leading SaaS job management company in Australia and retain New Zealand's prime status. The main goal of the Country Manager is to drive growth and adoption of Fergus in Australia and NZ.

What you’ll be doing:

    • Oversee Marketing and Brand Strategies to promote and scale
    • Ensure our support and customer relationships remain world class 
    • Lead, coach and continue to develop our high-performing ANZ GTM team
    • Meet and exceed budgets in partnership with ANZ Director of Sales, CFO and CEO. 
    • Be the key promoter and face of Fergus in Australia and NZ 
    • Work collaboratively with the global team to ensure best practice and consistency in processes. 
    • Continually assess progress: sales, partners, customer and marketing successes.  Prepare data reports regarding budgets, sales growth or declines, new business leads and regulatory compliance 
    • Grow our local partners across Associations, Wholesalers and Suppliers

Want to know more about working at Fergus? Check out what our people say here.

What you’ll be doing:

  • As a SaaS Partnership Manager, you’ll be responsible for all aspects of our partner programmes - leading, managing and enhancing partner relationships and growing our partnership ecosystem
